Literature.Title: Antagonistic activity of Lactobacillus plantarum C11: two new two-peptide bacteriocins, plantaricins EF and JK, and the induction factor plantaricin A.
Literature.Author: Anderssen EL, Diep DB, Nes IF, Eijsink VG, Nissen-Meyer J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pediococcus pentosaceus Pac1.0(MIC=0.10µM),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum 965(MIC=0.30µM),Lacticaseibacillus casei subsp. casei NCDO 161(MIC=0.250µM),Lacticaseibacillus casei NCDO 2713(MIC=>=6µM),Latilactobacillus sakei NCDO 2714(MIC=0.060µM),Weissella viridescens NCDO 1655(MIC=0.020µM),Pediococcus pentosaceus NCDO 990(MIC=>=6µM),Carnobacterium maltaromaticum UI49(MIC=>=6µM),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum UI50(MIC=>=6µM),Latilactobacillus sakei 706(MIC=>=0.50µM),Pediococcus acidilactici CH(MIC=>=0.50µM),Latilactobacillus curvatus 89(MIC=>=0.50µM)
